corn.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: plants such as wheat, barley, and oats or their seeds
corn.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: an ear of corn  (=the top part of this plant where the seeds grow)
corn.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a tall plant with large yellow seeds that grow together on a cob (=long hard part), which is cooked and eaten as a vegetable or fed to animals
corn.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: All our chickens are fed on corn.
corn.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a painful area of thick hard skin on your foot
